name: Protect Mother
description:
THIS GAME IS CURRENTLY IN ALPHA AND BUGS ARE EXPECTED.

Mother is in Danger!  

Use the crank to select egg and dice combinations to place baby dragons to defend her from hoards of enemies who would seek to harm her.  

Between levels, pick a blessing and cuse.  Mother is counting on you.  Don't let her down this time.

Controls

While on the battlefield, use crank to select a egg & dice combination.  Eggs will determine the type of dragon, and dice will determine the health and fire rate of the dragon.  Higher numbers mean more health, lower number means faster rate of fire.  Press A to select dragon.  

There are four types of Dragons

 

Normal dragons are the most common and do nothing special.

Ice dragons slow enemies.

 

Fire dragons fire explosions that can hit multiple rows.

 

Nature dragons fire piercing shots.

You lose if Mother's health reaches zero.

While at the shop, use crank to select a blessing & curse combination.  Each combination comes with one benefit and one curse, making both you and your enemies stronger.  Press A to pick a combination

Last as long as you can!

Installation

Instructions on how to sideload your game onto your playdate can be found here.

ALPHA STATUS

Thank you for your patience while I work on this project.  This is a hobby of mine that I work while not at my full time job.  I do not own a playdate yet, so I need your help to test this.

Currently, I need to know if there are any frame rate issues or game breaking bugs.

Obviously, please let me know if there are other bugs, but those will be my priority in the future.
